item.title: I've Worked Out The Perfect Marvel Role For Jenna Ortega After She Appeared In The MCU 11 Years Ago
item.description: Jenna Ortega is a star who could do great things in the MCU, and the MCU is already paving the way to cast her in her perfect Marvel role.

item.title: Gladiator 2 Ending: Macrinus's Fate & Thematic Connections Explained By Ridley Scott
item.description: Gladiator 2 director Ridley Scott discusses the fate of Denzel Washington's Macrinus and the thematic connections that make it a spectacle.

item.title: "A Wound In The Force": Darth Nihilus, KOTOR's Most Terrifying Sith Lord, Explained
item.description: Darth Nihilus was one of three powerful Sith Lords who nearly destroyed the Jedi Order, thanks to a horrifying ability that made him stand apart.
